title: Travel news site
description: A responsive travel news site built with HTML and CSS.

title: Rainy Nights Business site
description: A responsive business site made for a company, Rainy Nights Publishing.

title: The Beatbot
description: A chatbot that asks you what mood you are in and then suggests songs based on the answer.

title: Guess Who? Harry Potter Edition
description: The classic Guess Who? Game but this time with Harry Potter characters.

title: Weather App
description: Responsive web site using HTML, CSS and JavaScript ES6 to forcast the weather around the world using an weather API.

title: Github Tracker
description: Web application using APIs to fetch information about the projects in the Technigo Bootcamp.

title: Music Releases
description: A project about music releases that is using a set of data stored in a JSON file.

title: Citymail survey
description: A fake survey built for Citymail with React and useState to collect and store the answers.

title: Like Twitter, but for Happy Thoughts
description: Like the title suggest, this is Twitter, but for Happy Thoughts! Uses POST requests to send the new thought to the API.

title: Movies
description: Movies fetched from different APIs. You can see the popular movies or use the randomizer to let the site choose for you.

title: Foodie quiz
description: A quiz about food using Redux to store the answers and than displaying them at the end showing how many you got correct.

title: To do list
description: A classic to do list where you check off what you have done. You can also delete them and see all of the finished ones.

title: The Magic Labyrinth Game
description: The classic text based labyrinth game, now with visuals to guide you through the labyrinth.

title: stepTracker Native app
description: A stepTracker built with React Native and the pedometer built in the phone to count the steps.

title: Taylor Swift Music data with Express
description: An API with path and query params to list different sets of data. Filter out a specific album or year.

title: Taylor Swift Music data with Mongo DB
description: An API built using Mongo DB to set up the data. Filter data based on album or how long the songs are.
